org.mmbase.core.event

Interface EventListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AllEventListener, AssignmentEvents.Listener, EmailEventListener, Events.Listener, FullIndexEvents.Listener, IdEventListener, NewSearcher.Listener, NodeEventListener, ProposedJobs.Listener, RelationEventListener, SystemEventListener, TransactionEventListener, WeakNodeEventListener, WeightEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImages, AbstractServletBuilder, Actions, AggregatedResultCache, AnnotRel, Attachments, AudioSources, Authenticate.LocalAdmin, AuthRel, ClusterBuilder, ClusterManager, Contexts, Cookies, CronDaemon, CronJobs, DayMarkers, Dummy, EmailBuilder, EventManager, ExampleBuilder, Groups, IdRel, ImageCaches, Images, ImageSources, InsRel, Jumpers, KeywordsProcessor, Lucene, MediaFragments, MediaProviders, MediaSources, MMAdmin, MMEvents, MMObjectBuilder, MMServers, Multicast, Multicast, MultilevelCache, MyNewsBuilder, Netfiles, NetFileSrv, NodeCache, NodeListCache, Notifier, OAlias, OSCacheInvalidator, People, PeopleContexts, PosRel, Properties, QueryResultCache, Ranks, ReferredAttachments, RegexpReplacer.PatternWatcher, RelatedNodesCache, RelDef, Resources, ResourceWatcher, ResultBuilder, RightsRel, Searcher, SMSEventListener, SqlExecutorListener, Submitter, ThumbNailRemover, TypeDef, TypedNodeEventListenerWrapper, TypedRelationEventListenerWrapper, TypeRel, TypeRel.VirtualTypeRel, Unicast, Urls, User, UserBuilder, Users, Users, Utils, Versions, VirtualBuilder, VirtualReferrerBuilder, Vwms, Vwmtasks

    public interface EventListener
    This interface is the common type for custom EventListener interfaces. to create such a interface extend this one and add a method that will receive an event of the specific type.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.8
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Ernst Bunders
